items.sentence: Tom told me he was planning to go to Boston.
Tom didn\'t want to go to Boston by himself.
Tom didn\'t want to talk about his problems.
I wouldn\'t bet on that horse if I were you.
Tom says he doesn\'t remember what happened.
Tom and Mary took a walk through the garden.
Tom and Mary took the boat out of the water.
Tom doesn\'t realize he\'s doing that wrong.
You\'re not actually going to sing, are you?
Tom took another sip from his glass of beer.
Tom tossed the flowers into the garbage can.
Tom tried to stop Mary from going to Boston.
Tom tried to use reverse psychology on Mary.
I wish I hadn\'t gone to Australia with Tom.
I wish that Tom hadn\'t asked me to do that.
I won\'t be able to convince Tom to do that.
Tom was found guilty of first-degree murder.
Tom was holding something in his right hand.
Tom was hoping that Mary would smile at him.
Tom was just happy to be talking to someone.
